explanation: The stepped Reckoner was developed by Gottfried Whichelm Leibnitz.

text: The binary number 100101, can be written in denary as
The first stage in computer data processing procedure is
explanation: The first stage in computer data processing is the collection of data, which will be worked on.

text: One advantage of electronic data processing is that it
explanation: Electronic data processing can be used to handle complex and cumbersome data that would be impossible manually.

text: The type of computer that has the ability of counting in discrete form is referred to as
explanation: Digital computer counts in discrete form.Analog computer counts incontinuousform.Hybrid computer is a combination of both.

text: One reason for using Computer Aided Design in manufacturing is that

options.C: designers do not need training to use it
options.D: 3D designs are easily produced with it.

explanation: Computer - Aided Design systems are capable of creating complex 3D models, simulations, and visualizations which significantly impacts manufacturing.

text: Which one of the following statements is true about Voice Over IP? it

options.A: converts voice and video data into a digital signal and transfers it over the Internet.
options.B: converts voice and video data into a digital signal and broedcasts it via a transmitter.
options.C: is a voice over communication system which is cyber-attack proof
options.D: is a circuit-switched data communication system.

explanation: Voice over IP converts voice and video data into a digital signal and transfers it over the Internet.

text: Which one of the following sets of devices can be used to store data during processing?

options.C: Flash Drive, ROM and Hard Disk Drive

explanation: During processing, the cache, RAM and registers are used to store data.

text: The process of inspecting, transforming and modeling data to get useful information is known as
explanation: Data Analysis is the process of in- specting, transforming and modelling data get useful information.

text: One disadvantage of using computer for information processing is

options.B: increased running cost in the long run
options.D: redundancy of computers in the long run.

explanation: Computers require ongoing maintenance, software updates, hardware upgrades and potential repairs leading to increased running cost in the long run.

text: The diagram in Figure 1 illustrates process called
explanation: The process is known as information transmission.

text: The transmitter in communication is the component that

options.B: encodes interpreted data by using machine language

explanation: The transmitter launches the signal into the air where it can be received by a receiver.

text: Which of the following resources is not usually shared in a network?
explanation: Unlike folders, files and printers, a VGA projector is not typically shared in a network.

text: Factors to be considered when creating a backup system in a computer network include

options.A: amount of RAM, amount of data and time of backup
options.B: amount of RAM, type of data and frequency of backup
options.C: media to use, amount of data and frequency of backup.
options.D: media to use, type of data and time of backup.

explanation: The media to use, backup frequency and amount of data directly impact the effectiveness and reliability of the backup system, ensuring proper projection and retrieval of data, when needed.

text: The URL www.exams.edu.ng represents the website of
explanation: The URLwww.exams.edu.ngrepresentsthe website of an examination body in Nigeria.

text: The Post Ofice Protocol (POP) is used to

options.B: retrieve email from a mail server
options.C: transfer file from a server to a client
options.D: send email from one user to another.

explanation: The Post Office Protocol (POP) is an application-layer Internet standard protocol used by email clients to re- trieve e-mail from a mail server.

text:
A user working on a computer that is running on Windows 7 issued the com- mand "Ctrl + Alt + Del" while typing a document.
What interface is expected to be displayed on the screen?
explanation: Ctrl+Alt+Del loads the Windows security interface which provides options to: I. lock the computer II. switch user III. Sign out IV. Open task manage

text: Header and Footer are added to a document in MS Word by just clicking on the
explanation: The Internet menu tab can be used to add a header and footer to a document in MS word.

text: A typist positioned the insertion point at the beginning of a line of text in a word processor and then pressed down the Shift key and clicked at the opposite end of the text. What would be the result of this action? The text will be
explanation: This action highlights the line of text on the Screen

text: The Microsoft Excel menu bar icon shown in Figure 2 is used to

options.B: create label that spans multiple columns
options.C: spot trends and patterns in user's data using bars, columns and icons

explanation: This icon is the sort and filter icon. It is used to organize data for easy analysis.

text: To add a new column to the right of the IGR column on the interface in the figure above, the user would.

options.A: right click on cell Cl snf thrn click on insert
options.B: right click on cell Dl and then click on user
options.C: right click on column C and then click on insert
options.D: right click on column D and the click on user

explanation: Right-click on the column to the RIGHT of where you want the new column to be inserted, which is column D in this case and then click on insert.

text: The function of the foreign key in a database is to

options.A: uniquely identify tuples in a table
options.B: provide a link between data in two tables
options.D: uniquely identify each record in a table

explanation: The foreign key exists to provide a link between data in two tables.

text: How many primary keys exist in the figure above?
explanation: A primary key is a field that uniquely identifies each record. In this scenario, there are 3 primary keys in total: cus- tomerld, oderld, productld.

text: Which of the following lists contains the primary keys in the figure above?

options.D: Customers, CustomerId, FirstName, LastName, and DateCreated

explanation: customerld, orderld, productld.

text: Web design packages include the following, except
explanation: Macromedia Dreamweaver, iWeb, and FrontPage are all web design or web development tools used for creating and managing websites. Adobe PageMaker, however, is a desktop publishing software used mainly for creating print-based layouts, such as brochures, newsletters, and magazines, rather than for web design.

text: The part labelled IV in the image above is used to
explanation: The part labelled IV is the curve tool. It is used to draw lines, curves, and shapes.

text: One precautionary measure taken when cleaning a monitor is

options.D: using a vacuum cleaner to dust the monitor casing

explanation: For any electronic device, always unplug the power supply cable before cleaning.

text: Which one of the following practices is considered ethical?

options.A: Gaining access into school database to change one's grades
options.B: Gaining access into government database to alter personal details
options.C: Logging into a friend's social media account to read inbox messages
options.D: Signing into school e-library to read e-books

explanation: Ethical practice is the application of a good moral principles and values to guide decision-making and behaviour Only option D here satisfies that.

text: Proper network implementation and good ICT policies are types of
explanation: Proper network implementation and good ICT policies aim to prevent security incidents from happening in the first place, hence preventive measures.

text: Preventive maintenance measures in the computer room include the following options except
explanation: Use of rugs in the computer room is not recommended as rugs can generate static electricity which can damage sensitive computer equipment. They can also trap moisture leading to humidity issues and have poor heat dissipation.

text: A database administrator is responsible for the following tasks except

options.A: controlling and monitoring user access to the database
options.B: enrolling users and maintaining system security
options.D: maintaining connection between local network and the network and the internet

explanation: A database administrator is not typically responsible for maintaining the connection between a local network and the Internet.

text: Measures taken to avoid eye strain include the following except

options.A: adjusting the brightness of the monitor
options.B: adjustıng the height of the screen

explanation: Relaxing the body regularly is not directly a measure to avoid eye strain

text: A computer virus replicates itself into other programs or certain areas on the disk during the
explanation: During the propagation phase, a computer virus• identifies potential targets (e.g. executive files, boot sectors),• copies its code into the target program or area• modifies the target to execute the virus code

text: A malware that copies and replicates itself using computer network and security flaws is
explanation: • A wom is a malware that copies and replicates itself using network and security flaws•A spyware is a malware that secretly monitors and collects information about a user's activities• A trojan horse is a malware that disguises as a legitimate program or file but actually contains malicious code designed to harm your computer or steal your data.•A rootkit virus is a malware that hides itself and other malwares from the system software, allowing them to persist and cause harm without being detected.

text: The entities in the figure above are named
explanation: An entity is a table or collection of data that represents a real-world object or concept. Student and subject are entities.

text: Which one of the following statements is true about database tables?

options.A: All the tables in a database have a common name
options.B: A table may contain repeating groups
options.C: Entries in a column are from different domains based on datatype
options.D: There are no duplicate rows in a table

explanation: Entries in a column are from different domains based on datatype.

text: The major difference between serial and sequential files is that sequential files are
explanation: Sequential files are sorted in a particular order while serial files are simply stored one after the other.

text: Which one of the following pairs contains computer file classification?
explanation: A master file is a permanent file while transaction file is a temporary file used to update the master file.

text:
Which of the following statements supports the goals of data backup?
I. Need for duplication II. Need for future reference III. Protection against data loss
explanation: Need for duplication is not the primary goal of data backup, but rather. Duplication is a means to achieve data backup.

text: Which of the following characteristics is associated with the architecture of parallel database?

options.A: Communication cost and problems cannot be ignored
options.B: Machines can be far from each other
options.C: Machines are physically close to each other
options.D: It is usually associated with shared-nothing architecture

explanation: Shared-nothing architecture is a key characteristic of parallel databases.
